body:
The goal of this PR is to get py-pandas working. Along the way, I updated some of the python packages. The py-pandas package had some dependencies that, as far as I can tell, are not needed. I also removed some other python dependencies that are optional according to the pandas project.

http://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/install.html

I also added a couple of python packages that are recommended, one of which, py-bottleneck, is a new spack package.
title: Get py-pandas working plus some python package updates
